# PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.continuousAndOrdered

**Case**

An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately and displays selected photos with a numbered badge.

## Declaration

```swift
case continuousAndOrdered
```

## Discussion

This option notifies the app of photo selections dynamically, as someone taps the photo picker.

In addition, selected photos display a numbered badge that represents the order in which someone taps the photo.

## Selection methods

- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.default**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the default order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.ordered**: An option that provides selected photos to the app in the chosen order after the user confirms the selection.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Selection.continuous**: An option that provides the app a person’s selection immediately.
